title: Hybrid Science Learning Design: Application of Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environment construction for science-related job applications, operating in smartphone-based limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain science theories using mobile content at least three times per week on a hybrid learning platform.
Learners engage in collaborative problem-solving strategies with peers at an 80%+ participation rate through online discussion boards and weekly offline workshops.
Learners submit a project-based assessment demonstrating the application of scientific principles to real-world job situations at the end of the 4-week course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
